title: West Ham vs Manchester United player ratings
text:
Aaron Cresswell’s sublime free-kick helped down Manchester United and lift West Ham temporarily into fourth.

The Hammers ran out 2-0 winners at the London Stadium with Cresswell's wonderful effort following Andriy Yarmolenko’s opener in the first half.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s side were subdued throughout and lacked the intensity to match Manuel Pellegrino’s side.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

It presents a set-back for the United boss after building momentum in recent weeks and heightens the pressure on him.

Here are the player ratings from the London Stadium.

description: Aaron Cresswell’s sublime free-kick helped down Manchester United and lift West Ham temporarily into fourth.  The Hammers ran out 2-0 winners at the London Stadium with Cresswell's wonderful effort following Andriy Yarmolenko’s opener in the first half.  Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s side were subdued throughout and lacked the intensity to match Manuel Pellegrino’s side.
